contentfulHomePage.seoTitle: Quince | High Quality Essentials, Radically Low Prices
contentfulHomePage.seoDescription: Quince brings luxury products like Mongolian Cashmere, Italian Leather, Turkish Cotton and Washable Silk to everyone at radically low prices. Shop premium essentials with no middleman.

content.value: Happy Monday! This cooler weather is getting me so excited for fall. Fall fashion is my FAVORITE by far, I can‚Äôt wait to show you guys some of my favorite looks ü§ç

productDescription.productDescription: This classic yet casual alpaca sweater features a flattering cropped design made for your everyday. With a rib pattern, minimal button front, and a warm yet airy feel, this alpaca cardigan will become a staple in your winter wardrobe. It's long lasting and resistant to pilling.

productDescription.productDescription: Chic meets comfy in this Mongolian cashmere mock neck sweater. Featuring a flattering, cropped silhouette, this cozy sweater looks effortlessly cool whether worn out or tucked into your favorite pair of jeans.

content.value: Let it be known that at this very moment in time my bed is made. Wrinkly new duvet, but made.

productDescription.productDescription: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen flax duvet cover set offers year-round luxury and feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our linen only gets softer over time.

The classic silk slip dress features midi length and bias cut for a flattering fit. It is made from 100% washable 19mm Mulberry silk satin and hand washable and easy to wear. Don‚Äôt feel bad if you find yourself wearing it more than you should.

This midi linen dress should be in every wardrobe. Made from 100% organic linen and designed to be versatile, with elegant buttons down the front, and two pockets at the waist, and adjustable removable belt for the perfect fit.
Sweet simplicity ‚Äì this washable silk tee dress transitions from the office to the weekend with ease. Always chic, never fussy, this dress is an easy win every time

content.value: ¬†crossbody is the most versatile bag. The color and style makes it easy to wear with different styles and occasions and the perfect Gucci Soho Disco bag dupe. It‚Äôs less than $100 and made out of real Italian leather.

productDescription.productDescription: The classic cashmere sweater. Our Mongolian cashmere crewneck sweater is luxuriously soft, made from 100% Grade A cashmere, and available at a radically low price. A casual piece with a relaxed fit that is easy to layer or wear on its own.

content.value: Finally back in 90% humidity where the skin thrives üå¶

productDescription.productDescription: The classic silk slip dress features midi length and bias cut for a flattering fit. It is made from 100% washable 19mm Mulberry silk satin and hand washable and easy to wear. Don‚Äôt feel bad if you find yourself wearing it more than you should.

linkedProducts.title: Washable Stretch Silk Short Sleeve Blouse
linkedProducts.seoTitle: Washable Stretch Silk Short Sleeve Blouse | Quince

images.title: Washable Stretch Silk Short Sleeved Blouse - Military Olive

productDescription.productDescription: Made from soft and breathable stretch silk, this washable short sleeve silk blouse offers ultimate versatility. Easy to clean, but even easier to wear and style with just about everything.

content.value: ¬†I love everything about this dress from¬†
¬†for the summer. It is sustainable and it has pockets!! We love a dress with pockets! You can pair with flat slides for day or dress up with a strappy heels for night. How would you wear it?

productDescription.productDescription: This midi linen dress should be in every wardrobe. Made from 100% organic linen and designed to be versatile, with elegant buttons down the front, and two pockets at the waist, and adjustable removable belt for the perfect fit.

content.value: Happy Mother‚Äôs Day to my beautiful friends that are moms, to my friends moms who treat me like one of their own, and all the puppy moms. üíú

productDescription.productDescription: This midi linen dress should be in every wardrobe. Made from 100% organic linen and designed to be versatile, with elegant buttons down the front, and two pockets at the waist, and adjustable removable belt for the perfect fit.

content.value: Loads of natural light in this master bedroom & it easily became our favorite space ü§ç

linkedProducts.title: European Linen Double Edge Embroidery Duvet Cover
linkedProducts.seoTitle: Linen Double Edge Embroidery Duvet Cover | Quince

productDescription.productDescription: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight flax linen duvet offers year-round luxury and feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our linen only gets softer over time. The double flange and embroidered edge details add a touch of romantic sophistication.

productDescription.productDescription: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen duvet sham set offers year-round luxury and feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our linen only gets softer over time. The double flange and embroidered edge details add a touch of romantic sophistication. Set includes two shams.

content.value: High Quality Essentials, 50% - 80% Less Than Leading Luxury Brands.
High Quality Essentials, 50% - 80% Less Than Leading Luxury Brands.

Heritage Quality,
Soft & breathable,
Year round Luxury

Expertly hand quilted and stonewashed for a naturally lived-in look and feel, our 100% cotton quilt is a classic style that is both refined and casual. The cotton filling provides a mid-weight loft making it a perfect year-round layer.
Every Quince product is guaranteed to meet or exceed the quality standards of leading luxury brands. If you're not completely satisfied we'll give you a full refund.
Quality shouldn‚Äôt be a luxury. Our mission is to bring the world‚Äôs highest quality goods to everyone for affordable prices.

A beautiful Italian leather crossbody bag. Handcrafted in Florence, Italy from 100% Italian top grain leather. It's our best-selling leather bag for a reason. Luxury quality for an approachable price.

From the makers we choose to partner with, to the materials used, to our direct-from-manufacturer shipping, each part of our business is designed with sustainability in mind. A sustainable approach is paramount, and will continue to be even more important as we continue to grow.¬†

content.value: "Quince‚Äôs new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you‚Äôre getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50¬†buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,¬†
¬†is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It‚Äôs now a reality ‚Äî in 10 colors ‚Äî thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell¬†direct¬†to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I‚Äôm Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
